item.title: CVE-2023-2681|2024-08-02T06:33:04.208Z -- jorani -- jorani
item.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability has been found on Jorani version 1.0.0. This vulnerability allows an authenticated remote user, with low privileges, to send queries with malicious SQL code on the "/leaves/validate" path and the “id” parameter, managing to extract arbritary information from the database.
